entry.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack S323A03 / S345B07
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 16, 08:00 - 11:00 UTC

Nov 27, 09:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/12/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 16/12/2024 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack S323A03 / S345B07 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack S323A03 to S322A06 and S345B07 to S345B08.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 24D24
entry.content:
Dec 14, 14:38 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer causing unavailability of public network for servers located in the specified rack.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 14/12/2024 14:08 UTC
Service impact : Public network is temporarily unavailable for servers in rack 24D24.
Root cause : An electrical disjunction caused the incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.
We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve the problem.
We will keep you updated on any developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [YNM1][Virtual Private Servers] - Rack YNM0102G03A
entry.content:
Dec 12, 13:39 UTC
Resolved - An incident was in progress on our Bare Metal offer impacting the availability of some instances located in rack YNM0102G03A.
All instances are now operational since 12/12/2024 13:23 UTC.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start Time : 12/12/2024 10:33 UTC
End Time : 12/12/2024 13:23 UTC
Service impact : Some Virtual Private Servers instances located in rack YNM0102G03A were temporarily unavailable.
Root cause : Cooling module issue

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

entry.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - Room 46A/B - 46F
entry.content:
Dec 10, 16:40 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 09/12/2024 14:49 UTC
End Time : 10/12/2024 01:32 UTC
Service impact :We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. All the servers are now operational.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a power supply.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Dec 10, 01:32 UTC
Update - Please be advised that all servers are currently operational. However, we will continue to monitor the situation.

Dec 9, 21:02 UTC
Monitoring - Most of the impacted servers are operational.
There are a only a few servers still not operational and our team is working to fix the last one.

Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working to fix the very few remaining servers.

We will be monitoring the situation throughout the night.

Dec 9, 18:28 UTC
Update - The issue is still ongoing, and our team keep working on the fix.
We are expecting a better situation by 21:00 UTC.

We remind you that the impact is:

Service impact : A significant number of servers in the room 46A/B and a few servers in the room 46F are down.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working to resolve the issue and mitigate the impact.

Updates will be posted as significant progress is made.

Dec 9, 15:56 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented, some flapping still continue to occure.

We remind you that the following impact is still present :

Service impact : A significant number of servers in the room 46A/B and a few servers in the room 46F are down.
Ongoing actions : Our teams is working to fix the issue.

Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Dec 9, 15:04 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 09/12/2024 14:49 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the room 46A/B and a few servers in the room 46F are down.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Dedicated Servers] - Servers remote reboot
entry.content:
Dec 9, 13:49 UTC
Resolved - An incident happen on our Dedicated Servers offering. It has temporarily affected the restart.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 09/12/2024 10:15 UTC
End time : 09/12/2024 10:45 UTC
Service impact : Customers could no longer restart their servers remotely.

A rollback has been performed following the deployment of an API patch. Impacted services are now operational.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
